attributes.action: Replace Bruce Forsyth with Graham Norton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people and TV license payers iof Great Britain, petition the government as part of the Board of Governors of the BBC, to remove from BBC 1,'Strictly Come Dancing', the current host Brucie Forsyth. Brucie has done a sterling job in keeping us entertained since the invention of the Radio Wave, but the time has come to appoint a successor namely Graham Norton.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
